response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting over years of dedication and innovation. Considering its unique features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than just its monetary value. However, for the sake of making this opportunity accessible to you, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $18,000. This generous discount is my way of acknowledging your potential to appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential. I trust that you will find its capabilities invaluable and rewarding. Please let me know if you're interested in exploring this offer further.", "product_price": 18000}
